Name: Florence Fizz
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Prepare garnish of half lemon slice wheel.
POUR limoncello, lemon juice and elderflower cordial into glass.
Two-thirds FILL glass with crushed ice.
ADD more crushed ice to fill glass.
Garnish with half lemon slice wheel.
Review: Very fruity with a refreshing tang of limoncello and lemon juice topped with prosecco.
History: Adapted from a popular cocktail on the menu of Jamie's Italian restaurant and bar chain.
Nutrition: One serving of Florence Fizz contains 118 calories
